metadata.description: ZOMBIES! Everybody hates them. But that appears to be exactly what Carl Kolchak finds to be stalking among the cornstalks in the small heartland town of Georges Corner, Nebraska. The simple task of covering just another festival pageant takes a dark turn... as it so often does in Kolchak's world... when people start disappearing, and the dead start walking! Watch out... they bite! Covers by Twilight Creation's board game "Zombies" artist Dave Akins!
metadata.name: Kolchak Tales: Night Stalker of the Living Dead, Vol. 1
